data.title: Bunker Hill American Taproom Food Menu
data.meta_description: See the great food we have on our food menu. Kid-friendly menu. Takeout and catering available. Visit us at 1912 Wantagh Avenue or call 516-679-1775.
data.text:
There Can't Be Good Living Where There Is Not Good Drinking

-Ben Franklin

Located in Wantagh, NY

516-679-1775

HANDHELDS

Served with french fries and pickle. Add $2 for sweet potato fries, tater tots or side salad. Add $3 for truffle parmesan fries

Gluten free bread available $2.

A 4% surcharge is added to all credit/debit transactions. Prices shown reflect cash price.

Items may be cooked to order and may contain raw or undercooked ingredients. Consuming raw or undercooked meats, poultry, seafood, shellfish or eggs may increase your risk of food borne illness.

*Checks may only be split twice per table.
